Package userinterface

Class UIActionForm

java.lang.Object
userinterface.AbstractFrame
userinterface.DocumentCell
userinterface.UIForm
userinterface.UIActionForm
public class UIActionForm
extends UIForm
A class to denote the graphical concept of a form extended with the functionality of a customizable action. A UIActionForm extends a UIForm and contains a ContentSpan as contents and an associated action attribute to denote how to URL must be formed in combination with the values that are input by the user.

  • Constructor Details

    • UIActionForm

      public UIActionForm​(int x, int y, java.lang.String action, DocumentCell formContent)
      Create a new UIActionForm-object.
      Parameters:
      x - : The x coordinate of this UIActionForm.
      y - : The y coordinate of this UIActionForm.
      action - : The action attribute of the HTML-counterpart.
      formContent - : The content off the form. This should not directly or indirectly contain other UIActionForm-objects.

  • Method Details

    • getHandleMouse

      public ReturnMessage getHandleMouse​(int id, int x, int y, int clickCount, int button, int modifier)
      Get the response from this UIActionForm of a given click.
      Overrides:
      getHandleMouse in class DocumentCell
      Parameters:
      id - : The id of the click
      x - : The x coordinate of the click
      y - : The y coordinate of the click
      clickCount - : The number of clicks that occurred.
      button - : Which mouse button was clicked.
      modifier - : Extra control key that was held during the click.
      Returns:
      A representation of this UIActionForm's state encapsulated in a ReturnMessage object of the ReturnMessage.Type Form: containing the action attribute and name=value pairs of UITextInputFields.

    • getAction

      public java.lang.String getAction()
      Get the action associated with this UIActionForm.
      Returns:
      The form-action.
